title: Around the world under the sea
brief_description: Action adventure film about a group of scientists led by Dr Doug Standish (Lloyd Bridges) who set out in a submarine to plant sensors along the world’s ocean floors as an early warning earthquake alert following worldwide increased seismic activity. Cast includes Brian Kelly, David McCallum, Keenan Wynn, Marshall Thompson, Gary Merrill, Shirley Eaton.
